text: Cedar Rapids River Raiders are a former professional basketball team based in Cedar Rapids, Iowa. They were a part of the United States Basketball League. The organization was founded in 2003 and existed for one season (2004). They played their home games at U.S. Cellular Center. ==See also== *Cedar Rapids Silver Bullets == References == Category:United States Basketball League teams Category:Sports in Cedar Rapids, Iowa Category:2003 establishments in Iowa Category:2004 disestablishments in Iowa Category:Basketball teams in Iowa Category:Basketball teams established in 2003 Category:Sports clubs disestablished in 2004
title: Cedar Rapids River Raiders
